caption.title: ZIKV rRT-PCR positivity in bodily fluid samples by day post-symptom onset, collected in enrolled households in Managua, August to October, 2016.
caption.p: The graph depicts ZIKV rRT-PCR positivity (%) in serum/plasma, saliva and urine over days post-symptom onset. The numbers presented in the table at the bottom are the total number of specimens processed for each bodily fluid at each time-point.
